name: BreathingGame
description:
Description:

This game was developed in the Serious Games Hackathon. This game is based on two medical training of Breath Stacking and Positive Expiratory Pressure (PEP) Therapy, which help patients that are recovered from Covid-19, regain their lung capacity.

How to play:

To play this game you need a microphone. Hold the microphone near your mouth. When the signs says inhale try to inhale and when it says exhale, push the air from your lungs and try to fill the balloons completely.
